channel.title: Performance on Paul Simmering's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Paul Simmering's blog

item.title: Data frame wars: Choosing a Python dataframe library as a dplyr user
item.description: I’m a long time R user and lately I’ve seen more and more signals that it’s worth investing into Python. I use it for NLP with spaCy and to build functions on AWS Lambda. Further, there are many more data API libraries and machine learning libraries for Python than for R. Adopting Python means making choices on which libraries to invest time into learning.
